trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of DataColumnMapping objects, and is implemented by the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref>, which is used in common by .NET Framework data providers.
The <xref:System.Data.IColumnMappingCollection> interface enables an inheriting class to implement a ColumnMapping collection.
For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md).

An application does not create an instance of the <xref:System.Data.IColumnMappingCollection> interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits <xref:System.Data.IColumnMappingCollection>.
Classes that inherit <xref:System.Data.IColumnMappingCollection> must implement all inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality.
For example, the <xref:System.Data.IColumnMappingCollection> interface defines the <xref:System.Data.IColumnMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
In turn, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> class inherits this method, and defines two additional overloads of <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>.
Adds a ColumnMapping object to the ColumnMapping collection using the source column and <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column names.
The case-sensitive name of the source column.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column.
The ColumnMapping object that was added to the collection.

Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref> contains a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified source column name.
The case-sensitive name of the source column.
`true` if a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified source column name exists, otherwise `false`.
Gets the ColumnMapping object with the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column name.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column within the collection.
The ColumnMapping object with the specified `DataSet` column name.
Gets the location of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified source column name.
The name is case-sensitive.
The case-sensitive name of the source column.
The zero-based location of the `DataColumnMapping` object with the specified source column name.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.IColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified `SourceColumn` name.
The `SourceColumn` name of the `IColumnMapping` object to find.
The `IColumnMapping` object with the specified `SourceColumn` name.
Removes the <xref href="System.Data.IColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified <xref href="System.Data.IColumnMapping.SourceColumn"></xref> name from the collection.
The case-sensitive `SourceColumn` name.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object does not exist with the specified `SourceColumn` name.
